About The McGennis Family

Building a legacy of entrepreneurship, faith, and community service in Jefferson City, Missouri

Our Story

The McGennis family is on a mission to become Jefferson City, Missouri's most notable family through innovation, service, and unwavering commitment to our community. Led by Caleb Michael McGennis and Stephanie Kay McGennis, we're building businesses, serving in ministry, and raising the next generation of leaders.

Caleb, also known online as dr4g0nbyt3, brings entrepreneurial vision and technical expertise to our family's ventures. With multiple successful businesses including BXP, The Honey Homestead, What's the Process for, Toxic Tournaments, Nostalgia Nuke, and LoHP, our family demonstrates that diverse interests and passions can come together to create meaningful impact.

Our commitment extends beyond business. Caleb serves actively with Sports Crusaders ministry, bringing together faith and athletics to build community. His extensive ministry experience includes 5 years with the Missouri Baptist Convention and service at Concord Baptist Church.

Together with our two wonderful sons, Leonardo Bryton and Raphael Corwyn, we're building a family legacy rooted in faith, hard work, and service to Jefferson City and Central Missouri.
